bill_title: provide additional compensation for certain legislative officers and caucus leaders and to make an appropriation therefor.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide additional compensation for certain legislative officers and caucus leaders and to make an appropriation therefor. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the state general fund the sum of twelve thousand five hundred dollars ($12,500), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Legislative Research Council to provide additional compensation to certain legislative officers and caucus leaders of the Senate and the House of Representatives. The following members of the Senate shall receive compensation: president pro tempore, majority leader, assistant majority leader, majority whips, minority leader, assistant minority leader, and minority whips. The following members of the House of Representatives shall receive compensation: speaker, speaker pro tempore, majority leader, assistant majority leader, majority whips, minority leader, assistant minority leader, and minority whips. The chair and vice chair of the Legislative Research Council Executive Board shall also receive compensation. Section 2. The Legislative Research Council Executive Board shall determine the amount of additional compensation for each position provided for in section 1 of this Act. The director of the Legislative Research Council shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2005, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. Section 4. The additional compensation provided for in this Act takes effect at the commencement of the eightieth legislative session .
